definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Jos 9:4 sack, sackcloth (v. Schwally:ZAW xi (1891), 173 who conj. Egyptian origin; NH [[סַק]] sackcloth (rare); As. šaḳḳu, sack (D1:HWB 687 a), sackcloth (WKl:Altor. Forsch, vi. 44); Eth. 3aq: = BH; Aram. [[סַקָּא]], saqo0; Gk. sa/kkov Lewy:Fremdw. 87);—abs. ´[[שׂ]]: Ge 37:34 +, [[שָָׂק]] Je 48:37 +; sf. [[שַׂקִּי]] Ps 30:12, etc.; pl. [[שַׂקִּים]] Jos 9:4 +, sf. [[שַׂקֵּיהֶם]] Ge 42:35;—
sack, for grain Ge 42:25, Ge 42:27 (‖[[אַמְתַּחַת ]]), v:Ge 42:35; v:Ge 42:35 (E), Jos 9:4 (JE), perh. also Le 11:32 (P).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: worn in mourning and humiliation (v. Now:Arch. i. 192 f. SACook:Ency. Bib. s. v.), either loose garment like sack, or piece of similar material (of rough, dark hair), fastened round body: put ([[שִׂים]]) on loins Ge 37:34 (J), 1Ki 20:31, on (bare) flesh 1Ki 21:27, 2Ki 6:30, cf. Je 48:37, Job 16:15 (c. [[תָּפַר]]); ´[[וְהַעֲלֵיתִי עַל־כָּל־מָתְנַיִם שׂ]]: Am 8:10; usu. girt on ([[חָגַר]]) 2Sa 3:31, Is 15:3, Is 22:12, Je 4:8, Je 6:26, Je 49:3, Ez Eze 7:18, Eze 27:31, 1Ki 20:32, Joe 1:8, cf. Is 3:24; ´[[כִּסָּה בַּשּׂ]]: 2Ki 19:1, 2Ki 19:2 = Is 37:1, Is 37:2, Jon 3:6, Jon 3:8, 1Ch 21:16, fig. of heavens (cf. [[קָדַר]]), [[אָשִׂים כְּסוּתָם]] ´[[שׂ]]: Is 50:3; late ´[[לָבַשׁ שׂ]]: put on sackcloth Jon 3:5, Es 4:1, cf. v:Es 4:2, Ps 35:13, Ps 69:12; ´[[בְּחוֹם וְשׂ]]: Ne 9:1, cf. Da 9:3; ´[[פִּתַּח שׂ]]: loosen sackcloth Is 20:2 (+ [[מֵעַל]]), Ps 30:12 (opp. [[שִׂמְחָה]]), [[מֵעַל]] ´[[הֵסִיר שׂ]]: Es 4:4.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: same garment (or material) spread out (to lie on), 2Sa 21:10 (c. [[הִטָּה]]), Is 58:5 (c. [[הִצִּיעַ]]), cf. Es 4:3 ´[[וַיִּשְׁכַּב בַּשׂ]]: 1Ki 21:27, ´[[לִינוּ בַּשּׂ]]: Joe 1:13.
